website_summaries.verdict: Produces clean, accurate holes. Industrial-strength drill bits made from cobalt for high-level work.
pros: Sizes from 1/16" to 1/2" - great for most jobs
Good length for drilling into deep wood
Can also drill stainless steel and tough materials
cons: Above-average cost for a set of drill bits
No bits in the set larger than 1/2 inch in diameter

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt customer service replaced defective bits without question
customer_reviews.text: I just rec'd a replacement set after going directly to DeWalt customer service site. They replaced the original set because the three largest drill bits broke off. This appears to be a problem due to brittleness. When you see the broken pieces there is no sign of twisting. The pieces do not look like metal, almost like plastic in nature. Because these bits are expensive to replace individually it is good to get another new set. Bottom line is be very careful, taking out as little metal at a time as you can to not break the bits. I do not think DeWalt has acknowledged they have a problem, I will see when I try out the new bits.
customer_reviews.author: K. Postema

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bits
customer_reviews.text: The pilot point should be standard on every drill bit! Whenever I get in the situation that I need a drill bit, I want the least amount of stress. These things cut straight through 7075 billet aluminum with ease, amounts well as the dreaded stainless. Awesome bits even ether price amounts last super long!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best bits I own
customer_reviews.text: Dude!!! Tested these bad boys out when they arrived(on time). Took the 3/8 and started drilling thru 1 1/2 of cast iron. I did use a little cutting oil but these things went thru that cast like it was butter!! I'll choose these over my BAD DOG BITS. Just beware of when they break through, they grab really bad and if yer not ready you'll twist yer fricken arm off😁
customer_reviews.author: Awesomo5000

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. These are tough and durable and get the job right.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Grall

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Drill Bits
customer_reviews.text: These drill bits are the BEST bits I have ever used. I drilled thru steel and wood, and they went right through without hesitation. The pilot points avoids slipping of the tip on the surface and keeps the drill going straight. They do NOT grab at all as some other people mentioned. Actually I was able to fine tune the holes without the bit being dragged in. It is great to have all drill sizes in one container.
customer_reviews.author: EdS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping there were a couple more small sizes, as I need to repair a light fixture using a particular screw. Used the smallest bit, and it promptly broke. I'm a seasoned handyman, so I don't blame it entirely on me. Thought these would be tougher. No doubt the larger ones are.
customer_reviews.author: parker

customer_reviews.title: The Best Drill Bits!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Dewalt Cobalt Pilot-Point Drill Bits!! I have purchased other brands of drill bits and after using the Dewalt bits, I realize the others were not working well. The Dewalt drill bits are fast and clean drilling. I will only use Dewalt drill bits in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: these are good and strong
customer_reviews.text: We were having trouble with drill bits breaking, these are good and strong!
customer_reviews.author: Deme

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Drill Set
customer_reviews.text: This set is exactly what I needed, with the complete bit range up to 1/2" in 1/64 increments. I'm not doing production quantity drilling, so I don't know how long they will remain sharp, but I imagine I'll get many years of use out of them. As an inventor/fabricator, you need options for hole sizes and this set gives me that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Golightly

customer_reviews.title: Nice index set
customer_reviews.text: You've gotta pay for quality. This bit set is cheap for a cobalt set, but still seems perfectly adequate. If you're working with metal (especially stainless) on a regular basis and need a nice indexed selection, I'd recommend this highly. I hide it in the back of my toolbox so it won't get used until I really need that 11/64ths...
customer_reviews.author: Hi Desert

customer_reviews.title: Covalt is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing drill bits. I'll never buy anything but cobalt drill from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice package and plenty of sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to drill out the hardened studs in my exhaust. I ruined three bits and never did get any of them drilled out. I was expecting them to cut harder material.
customer_reviews.author: Rex S

customer_reviews.title: 29 pieces set is too many for me.
customer_reviews.text: It may be suitable 12 or 13 pieces for me. So I recommend another one. Regardless of the pieces, these drills are good. When I used these bits, I could make holes easily. Although one of them was broken when using it, I think these bits are enough strong and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Moon Gi

customer_reviews.title: These bits make drilling metal real easy. I did burn up the 1/2" bit and ...
customer_reviews.text: These bits make drilling metal real easy. I did burn up the 1/2" bit and still not sure why. Maybe I forgot to use the CRC 03400 cutting fluid.
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, a heavy set of bits
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, this box of bits is heavy - maybe a pound and a half - lots of bits - so will weigh down your toolbox if you have to carry it around
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stone

customer_reviews.title: Like drilling through butter
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after receiving these, I was drilling thru hardened steel and these bits went right through. I packed up my old bits and got rid of them, these are the only bits that I will need from now on.
customer_reviews.author: dukiefever

customer_reviews.title: The best there is ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and drill all kinds of things being the do it yourselfer, then you know that a Cobalt set will be in order. This set has the whole range and works as good as expected. The rugged case can take a drop or two, and the price was very competitive. I have not experienced resharpening and will look forward to someone educating me on that process.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: A high quality product that is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: These drill bits rip through anything.....aluminum is like butter, Stainless and regular steel is like aluminum, and hardwood is like balsa. Best money I've ever spent on drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: Ouderkirk

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the collection....
customer_reviews.text: I really only needed these for one job that I had, so I'm not sure if I made a wise choice on my part buying a set. Although these to work very good. I needed them to drill holes in a few stainless steel bolt that had been seized on my exhaust and the worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Chafner_0711

customer_reviews.title: Foe the ex
customer_reviews.text: He really liked getting these as a gift and at the time, they were the cheapest price of all of the same kind Drill bit sets. He is a carpenter and uses them ALL of the time. NO COMPLAINTS from him, which is a rare thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lover of all things Christmas!

customer_reviews.title: Not crazy about this
customer_reviews.text: 1) More of the bits should have been hex bases. 2) the @#$!@#@$ box is very hard to open. Takes two hands and both biceps....not good but required to crack this lock box open every time I need a bit is starting to get old.
customer_reviews.author: wtc

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER QUALITY product from Dewalt.
customer_reviews.text: These are VERY good drill bit... they are very sharp . some people don't like the point because it goes in FAST.. I like the sharpness
customer_reviews.author: chuckles

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The pilot point is nice. Cobalt will last a long, long time. Use cutting fluid with them on harder metal. Nice set with a sturdy plastic case.
customer_reviews.author: JeffersonOh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: this is a really nice drill index. Only complaint I can think of is the latch on the case is quite difficult to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: keith Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: love em
customer_reviews.text: If you know how to use a cobalt bit you will not be disappointed. Only down fall with these is they cannot be sharpened. The pilot point makes for easier drilling and centering though
customer_reviews.author: Ray Thibault

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: These drill bits are worth every dollar. The pilot-point makes drilling easy by reducing a drill bit's drift/walk. The cobalt is so much better than a thin coating on the titanium bits.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn One

customer_reviews.title: decent quality i think.
customer_reviews.text: starts cut well, haven't used them for long so can't speak to long term durability yet. but the dewalt 10" saw blades i have, have taken a beating over the past few years and are still cutting strong.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wallas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bits
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bits...probably the best DeWalt has ever manufactured. They appear to have been discontinued so get yours before they are gone.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalJoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bits, they keep drilling, and haven't gone dull yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These drill bits were supposed to be good quality coming from a name brand like DeWalt
customer_reviews.text: These drill bits were supposed to be good quality coming from a name brand like DeWalt. Maybe they aren't the best since one of them already broke under light use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bajema

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and strong
customer_reviews.text: These bits are super strong and very sharp and will last a long long time. I did have a few issues with them being too aggressive in certain situations. Like putting cabinets together when I was trying to do things to a specific bit depth I found that these bits just want to bite in a dig. So while they are a great bit they might be a little too great in some situations at least for me I found myself reaching for my older bits in certain situations.
customer_reviews.author: RGillund

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best set of drills I have owned. Cuts steel like butter, it performs greatly even on stainless at proper speed and lubing.
customer_reviews.author: Stef.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered quickly and DeWalt Cobalt drill bits work great. The case make it easy to store and find bits. Now if I can just get the worker to put them back when they are done with them I will be able to find them when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: John Hollander

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is an expensive product, but they are a very good and complete set of drill bits. Just I wish I had bought this one first and never bought all those other sets.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: super quality
customer_reviews.text: super quality and price , fast delivery. can't get better bits , i use these every day and they drill stainless perfectly and live to work another hole.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Willman

customer_reviews.title: cuts like hot knife thru butter
customer_reviews.text: wish this had been my first set. cuts like hot knife thru butter.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: great tools
customer_reviews.text: These are a high quality bits that go through metal very easily and they do the same job again and again. I highly recommend them especially if you have lot of work to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ramzi Haroun

customer_reviews.title: Terrible on sheet metal especially
customer_reviews.text: Lousy bits. When you complete drilling the hole the bit pulls or tug on the drill. Terrible on sheet metal especially.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: the only tools i like from Dewalt are their drill bits. these work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: NdO PgO

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: The local big box store did not have these. I bought for their durability. I am happy and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Beldar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty good bits, small bits got dull pretty fast though.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Work well but not USA made. Quality is better than average china made bits.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt DW1269 Cobalt bit index set
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old cordless drill with the Milwaukee brushless hammer drill. A top drawer tool deserves a top drawer drill bit set. I have owned several index sets over the years and finally made the wise choice of Cobalt this time. I have had quite a few projects around the house to test these bits. There is SUCH a difference in Cobalt. These bits bite true and cut fast. You will be happy you spent a little more for a whole lot more quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cary

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these bits if you like doing things the hard way these bits make everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these bits if you like doing things the hard way these bits make everything so darn easy theay chew through the worst you can put in front of them these bits will make you curse your old bits as you begin using them for target practice
customer_reviews.author: Darren White

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had junk drills before but these are good general purpose drills. Use them all the time for metal and wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Braun

customer_reviews.title: Best drill bits I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: High price but went thru metal like butter, Dewalt has great products,almost all of my cordless 18 volt tools are Dewalt
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on the larger bits. The smallest ones sometimes slip in my 3/8 drill.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt drill bit set
customer_reviews.text: This was a great item. Thrilled the recipient for sure/ Price was exceptional and product everything I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Quick & almost painless
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few weeks, and used 5 bit sizes. The larger sizes work better if used at lower speeds after the pilot point breaks through. Have your PPE handy when drilling overhead. These bits are very sharp, and drill a nice round hole. Anxious to see how they handle stainless steel and iron structural framing.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: cobalt drill bits
customer_reviews.text: these cobalt drill bits came oiled and they are very sharp. the things you can drill with them are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent drill bits. One must always use cutting oil when drilling in hardened metal.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Ploessl

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my father to replace his old set. All I can say is that these are high quality and very sharp!
customer_reviews.author: James Nici

customer_reviews.title: Worst bit set I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Worst bit set I ever owned. They break so easily I am very dissatisfied with this Dewalt tool. I have a shop full of Dewalt stuff don't buy these!!!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DW1269 29-Piece Cobalt Pilot-Point Drill Bits
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of drill bits, I love them. I have a couple of other sets of old bits and they always need to be sharpened or the size I need is missing. These DeWalt bits drill through almost anything with ease. They always go straight and never run side ways when starting a hole. I would recommend them to anyone. If you need drill bits you can't do any better than these.
customer_reviews.author: Randy225

customer_reviews.title: Low quality.
customer_reviews.text: What to say but that I'm for once disappointed in DeWalt's quality. On the second hole I drilled with the 1/2" bit, it shaved off half the cutting edge of the bit. When I buy a $100 set of drill bits advertised for their strength, I don't expect them to be single use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: So far very strong
customer_reviews.text: Is very good my husband has been using these bits and hasn't broken one yet.which is very unusual would very highly recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Barker

customer_reviews.title: I bought the complete set because they were supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the complete set because they were supposed to be tougher than what I can get locally. I only have a couple of holes to drill in a metal bed frame. I have burned up 6 bits and have one hole to show for it. Using them in a drill press with cutting oil. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Milburn

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the bits but a couple of times but they work fabulous. I love the square shank in my drill, no bit spinning in the chuck.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Buser

customer_reviews.title: wooooweeeee
customer_reviews.text: These things will drill through solid ice. I got 'em on a shelf in my living room to show off.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!
customer_reviews.text: These drill bits are the envy of all my friends. They are expensive compared to other drill bits of less quality, but very well worth the price after you have had a chance to use them. They make drilling effortlessly when compared to titanium drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: Parallax

customer_reviews.title: drill bits
customer_reviews.text: cobalt bits are hardess metal that a drill bit is made out of. It doesnt get any better than this.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: These bits have been one of the best investments in my toolkit that I've ever made. From home and garden projects to drilling out metal rivets there has been nothing so far that these bits cannot handle.
customer_reviews.author: volare

customer_reviews.title: very bad
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. I was finally trying to buy a "GOOD" set of bits that would work well AND last a long time. Wrong !!! Tried to drill 3/8" hole in regular 1/8" steel. After the point went in the bit started smoking and quit cutting and turned black. Tried another ,same thing. JUNK !!!
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Zanotti

customer_reviews.title: COBALT RULES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I WAS IN THE PROCESS OF SEARCHING FOR THE 1969 PILOT POINT WHEN I CAME ACROSS THIS SET OF JEWELS..IT WAS A NO-BRAINER THAT I SELECTED THE COBALT,ESPECIALLY SINCE THE COST WAS ONLY $69.OO!!!THE DURABILITY OF THESE BITS ARE WHAT YOU WOULD EXPECT..IF I HAD TO DECIDE ON PURCHASE AGAIN,I WOULD NOT HESITATE TO BUY THESE..THEY ARE WELL WORTH THE DEFERENCE IN COST,ESPECIALLY WHEN YOU CAN FIND A DEAL LIKE THE ONE THAT I FOUND!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Most overrated product on Amazon?
customer_reviews.text: Supposedly, these bits slice thru stainless steel like the proverbial hot knife through butter. Well, that's not my experience, in the slightest. In fact, they UNDER-performed basic bits I get at Home Depot. Sad but true. Using decent Ryobi cordless drills, I first tried them on some serious metal: barely made a dent. Worked my way down to, a thin sheet of tin. Eventually, I got them to punch their way thru. Needless to say, an incredible disappointment. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis C. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: drill bits
customer_reviews.text: DEWALT DW1269 29-Piece Cobalt Pilot-Point Metal Drill Bit Index Set. These bits have done an outstanding job for me. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: will not drill the knife steel I purchased them for even at the slowest speed on my drill press but work fine on all other appli
customer_reviews.text: decent drill bits, will not drill the knife steel I purchased them for even at the slowest speed on my drill press but work fine on all other applications
customer_reviews.author: richscha

product_meta.title: DEWALT DW1269 29-Piece Cobalt Pilot-Point Metal Drill Bit Index Set
product_meta.description:
AMAZON.COM
The DEWALT DW1269 29-piece cobalt pilot-point metal drill bit index set comes with pilot-point tips for starts on contact that result in clean, accurate holes. With an industrial-grade cobalt finish for drilling in stainless steel and other abrasive metals, these bits are designed to reduce lock-up on breakthrough, and also feature a no-spin shank that eliminates the frustration of bit spinning in the chuck. Other features include a tapered web for greater durability and reduced breaking, and size markings are located above the shank to prevent wearing away. This kit includes 29 bits, measuring 1/16 to 1/2 inch by 64ths, and a storage case.
feature_bullets: Maximum speed and life in stainless steel and other hard metals
Pilot-point tip starts on contact for clean, accurate holes and reduces lock-up on breakthrough
Industrial-strength cobalt for optimum life and durability in metal
Size markings are located above the shank to prevent wearing away
Included with this kit: 29 bits (measuring 1/16 to 1/2 inch by 64ths), and storage case

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars133 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
